mapper.select:
SELECT name AS label, REPLACE(stable_id, CONCAT(cancer_study_identifier, '_'), '') AS value, count(sample_id) AS count FROM sample_list_list sll LEFT JOIN sample_derived s ON sll.sample_id=s.internal_id LEFT JOIN sample_list sl on sll.list_id=sl.list_id
AND label IS NOT NULL GROUP BY s.cancer_study_identifier, sl.stable_id, sl.name
